verses.name: Nehemiah 3:4
verses.text: And next unto them repaired Meremoth the son of Urijah, the son of Koz. And next unto them repaired Meshullam the son of Berechiah, the son of Meshezabeel. And next unto them repaired Zadok the son of Baana.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:5
verses.text: And next unto them the Tekoites repaired; but their nobles put not their necks to the work of their Lord.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:6
verses.text: Moreover the old gate repaired Jehoiada the son of Paseah, and Meshullam the son of Besodeiah; they laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, and the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
